name: Totally Normal Pong!
description:
Important Notices and Info

Use W to move your paddle up and S to move the paddle down.
You play against a very basic pong AI and 3 difficulty levels to choose from, normal mode is highly recommended, and the first to 10 points win

Local Multiplayer

The Local Multiplayer mode allows you to play the game with another person with the same keyboard. Control the blue player with W and S, and control the red player with Up and Down arrow keys.

What is this game?

This game was made for Ludum Dare 49 (My first time taking part in Ludum Dare)
Lore: You buy a pong game but when you get home and boot it up to find out it was not developed well and janky, but the jank makes for an interesting playthrough.

Developer Information

This game was developed by DevNugget.
Sound Effects, Art, and Music were made myself during the Jam.
